annotation_sentence: Yes, I think all ages can read.
rationale: The word 'all' is a quantifier indicating the totality of ages that can read.

annotation_sentence: It is, um, good for... young and old, and anyone who... want to dream.
rationale: The word 'anyone' is a quantifier indicating any person without restriction.
The word 'Every' is a quantifier indicating each instance without exception.
